snippet: Jhonny Peralta, a career infielder who started in left field on Saturday night, had eight hits and six runs batted in through Detroit’s first six postseason games.
lead_paragraph: Jhonny Peralta, a career infielder who started in left field on Saturday night, had eight hits and six runs batted in through Detroit’s first six postseason games.

headline.main: Tigers Find a Place on the Field for Peralta, and His Bat Answers Questions
headline.print_headline: Tigers Find a Place on the Field for Peralta, and His Bat Answers Questions
